CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?
CTR.A: This chart is a {stacked area chart}.

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stacked area chart?

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total employee satisfaction?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Human Resources}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total employee satisfaction?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Operations Staff}.

VE.Q: What is Operations Staff's Employee Satisfaction in 1980?
VE.A: Operations Staff's employee satisfaction in 1980 is {88.28} %.

VE.Q: What is Operations Staff's Employee Satisfaction in 1975?
VE.A: Operations Staff's employee satisfaction in 1975 is {86.12} %.

VE.Q: What is Human Resources's Employee Satisfaction in 1970?
VE.A: Human Resources's employee satisfaction in 1970 is {81.27} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum total Employee Satisfaction in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum total employee satisfaction is {129.74} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum total Employee Satisfaction in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum total employee satisfaction is {188.28} %.

SC.Q: What is the average height of Human Resources's Employee Satisfaction area?
SC.A: The average height of Human Resources's employee satisfaction area is {85.95} %.

SC.Q: What is the average height of Operations Staff's Employee Satisfaction area?
SC.A: The average height of Operations Staff's employee satisfaction area is {71.99} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Employee Satisfaction go below 147 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {146.38} % in {1972}, total value was {139.37} % in {1973}, total value was {134.29} % in {1967}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Employee Satisfaction exceed 170 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {177.81} % in {1975}, total value was {176.97} % in {1976}, total value was {170.97} % in {1970}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Employee Satisfaction fall between 151 and 167 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {159.59} % in {1965}, total value was {153.60} % in {1966}, total value was {156.32} % in {1974}.

NC.Q: Between 1976 and 1981, was the average total Employee Satisfaction higher or lower than between 1966 and 1968?
NC.A: The average total employee satisfaction between {1976} and {1981} was {higher} than between {1966} and {1968}.

NC.Q: Between 1968 and 1970, was the average total Employee Satisfaction higher or lower than between 1971 and 1980?
NC.A: The average total employee satisfaction between {1968} and {1970} was {lower} than between {1971} and {1980}.

NC.Q: Between 1971 and 1976, did the total Employee Satisfaction experience a larger or smaller change than between 1973 and 1978?
NC.A: The change in total employee satisfaction between {1971} and {1976} was {smaller} than between {1973} and {1978}.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1981, was the average total Employee Satisfaction higher or lower than between 1965 and 1980?
NC.A: The average total employee satisfaction between {1978} and {1981} was {higher} than between {1965} and {1980}.
